subject: Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Emanuele Sella of Italy was suspended by his team, CSF-Navigare, after testing positive for the blood booster EPO. Sella, the top climber in this year’s Giro d’Italia, failed an out-of-competition test the International Cycling Union ordered last month, Italy’s cycling federation said.
